text: Gaetano Belvederi (1821-1872) was an Italian painter, active in Bologna. He studied at the Collegio Venturoli. Among his works are:La storia delle arti del disegno, studiata nei monumenti che si conservano in Bologna e nei suburbi, by A.C. Romagnoli, D. Giannitrapani, published by Tipografia Gamberini e Parmeggiani, 1888, page 114. * The Funeral Procession (convoglio funebre) di Zerbino * Flight of Angelica Galeazzo Marescotti * Italian mothers in the field after the Battle of San Martino * Rocco Sileo brings poison to his imprisoned Son * A Poor Woman Takes her Children to Fight for the Nation * A Law lesson of the Pannier (dalla bigoncia) di San Stefano in Bologna * Portrait of Napoleon 3rd for the Marchese Luigi Pizzardi still at Palazzo Legnani Pizzardo, Bologna ==References== Category:19th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Bolognese painters Category:1821 births Category:1872 deaths
